Episodes.Title: Wrong Turn (1)
Episodes.Plot: The anniversary of Dog's daughters' tragic death looms as they face a fugitive hell bent on getting away. As Dog and the team hunt this fugitive in a speeding SUV, the team wonders if the same fate awaits this fugitive.

Episodes.Title: Wrong Turn (2)
Episodes.Plot: Dog and his team track a fugitive, with a bad reputation and a knack for eluding the law, to try to put him behind bars.

Episodes.Title: Midnight Run (1)
Episodes.Plot: This fugitive has a bad reputation and a knack for running from the law. The pursuit has Dog and team traveling through an urban dystopia of suspicion, false leads and mistrust. And the more they learn about their target, the more they believe that he needs to be behind bars.

Episodes.Title: Midnight Run (2)
Episodes.Plot: This fugitive has a bad reputation and a knack for running from the law. The pursuit has Dog and team traveling through an urban dystopia of suspicion, false leads and mistrust. And the more they learn about their target, the more they believe that he needs to be behind bars.

Episodes.Title: Easy Rider (2)
Episodes.Plot: A tip from some children might help Dog locate a fugitive's girlfriend so he can try to enlist her assistance in bringing him in.

Episodes.Title: The Hunt for Santa (1)
Episodes.Plot: Bobby Brown asks Dog and his team for help hunting a fugitive, but they take his promise that "it will be an easy one" with a grain of salt.

Episodes.Title: Call Waiting
Episodes.Plot: Dog's investigative chops are tested by a bounty that keeps leading him closer to his childhood haunts.

Episodes.Title: Kid Stuff
Episodes.Plot: A tip from some children might help Dog locate a fugitive's girlfriend so he can try to enlist her assistance in bringing him in.

Episodes.Title: Easy Does It
Episodes.Plot: Dog suspects the true intentions of a fugitive's girlfriend when she offers to help Dog trap the felon.

Episodes.Title: Ghost Rider
Episodes.Plot: Dog underestimates a fugitive because of her non-threatening appearance.

Episodes.Title: Back in the Hood
Episodes.Plot: Dog believes that the family that plays together stays together. But what happens when a family's idea of fun is getting high and running amuck? Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career. Suited up and ready, the crew heads out and descends on the fugitive's last known address. At the door, the mother insists t

Episodes.Title: One for the Road
Episodes.Plot: Dog's got a twofer on his hands, but the cases couldn't be more different. The first is a woman whose family wants her back in jail, the other is a former choirboy whose family ties are strong. Darlene's been busted for third degree promotion and her sister, fed up with her behavior, wants off the bond. Dog will do his best to straighten her out but he has his doubts about making a difference. The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive named Fred who is f

Episodes.Title: Bait and Switch (1)
Episodes.Plot: The team pursues a fugitive over volcanic mountains and into the wilds of Puna, Hawaii.

Episodes.Title: Bait and Switch (2)
Episodes.Plot: Dog calls Tim Chapman out of retirement to help him track an elusive fugitive.

Episodes.Title: True Identity
Episodes.Plot: Dog sets out to bring in a runner and ends up helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

Episodes.Title: Secrets and Lies
Episodes.Plot: Dog and his posse track a first-time offender whose life is at a crossroads.

Episodes.Title: Match Point
Episodes.Plot: Duane Lee and Leland must cut their tennis match short in order to help Dog catch a fugitive with no known address.

Episodes.Title: Menehune Mischief
Episodes.Plot: The team pursues a fugitive over volcanic mountains and into the wilds of Puna, Hawaii.

Episodes.Title: Mister Mom
Episodes.Plot: Dog calls Tim Chapman out of retirement to help him track an elusive fugitive.

Episodes.Title: Bait & Snitch
Episodes.Plot: Two fugitives team up to go on the run together.

Episodes.Title: Scared Straight
Episodes.Plot: Beth hopes for a romantic anniversary dinner with Dog, but the call of duty spoils their plans.

Episodes.Title: All My Children (1)
Episodes.Plot: When Dog gives a drug addict a second chance, the man flees on his way to rehab.

Episodes.Title: All My Children (2)
Episodes.Plot: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call--The Dog!

Episodes.Title: Welcome to the Jungle (1)
Episodes.Plot: Christopher is barely 21, already has history of domestic abuse and assault, and now he's facing major time in a room without a view.

Episodes.Title: Welcome to the Jungle (2)
Episodes.Plot: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family.
